reviews.review: Best place to learn fluent Russian

I have way to many hours into this game. And i can tell you since the last major rank restructure, the game is extremely unbalanced and full of hackers. The game moved to free-to-play a while back because the company wanted to move away from paying for the game to paying for skins and cases. I play the game every now and again because I know its populated and does not take much skill to play in the lower levels, allowing me to not have to play consistently to have some level of fun. If you do not already have the game. Its really not worth the time..

Oynaması ücretsiz yapıldıktan sonra ardı arkası kesilmeyen bir hile problemi var. Madem hile kullanan birlikte girdiğimiz bir parti üyesi yasaklandığında bizim aldığımız zaferlerden düşüyor, o zaman karşımızdaki rakip kullanıcı da hileden ban yediği zaman bizim onlar ile oynadığımız maçlar silinsin. Ya hileye çözüm bulun yada sadece parayla satın alanlar seçkin olsun.

This game requires actual skill and not luck. It's a great game with a shit client. I have beening playing cs since 1.3 beta and I would like to see this game get a more invasive anti cheat and a cs:go update to Source engine 2. The MM servers should be 128 tic. There is no reason with the player base that they should be 64 tic
